text: Tarcísio Magalhães Sobrinho, usually known as Tarcísio Meira (October 5, 1935 - August 12, 2021) was a Brazilian actor. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. He was one of the first actors to work in the most popular Brazilian channel Globo. His best known roles were as Military Christ in The Age of the Earth (1980) and as Ulisses in I Love You (1981). In 1962, Meira married actress Glória Menezes. They had one child. Meira died at a hospital in São Paulo from COVID-19 on August 12, 2021 at the age of 85.Tarcísio Meira morre aos 85 anos, vítima da Covid-19 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in São Paulo Category:Actors from São Paulo Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors
title: Tarcísio Meira
